characters.name: Her (Water World)

physicalCore.skinTone: warm brown with cool undertones, as if lit from within by refracted water light
additionalFeatures: Movements carry a fluid, deliberate quality even when still
Body language reads as contained energy rather than passivity
Posture shifts from closed and guarded (early) to open and upright (late)

faceSignature.structure: soft oval face with defined cheekbones, gentle jawline
faceSignature.eyes: deep brown eyes, large and expressive, reflective quality as if holding unshed tears
faceSignature.hair: long dark hair that moves as if underwater even in still air, loose and flowing past shoulders
distinctiveFeatures: Eyes that communicate volumes with minimal movement
Lips slightly parted in observation, rarely fully closed or open
Subtle tension in brow that softens across the arc

default.description: Futuristic yet simple draped clothing that flows with water physics. Layered soft fabrics with asymmetric hem that moves independently. No armor, no hard edges. The garment feels alive in the water environment, responding to currents.
default.signature: Asymmetric draped outer layer that floats and trails in water currents, creating visual echo of her movements

characters.notes: Symbol of adaptation, endurance, and learning to move within a hostile but non-violent environment. Emotional state: afraid that time will never move forward, lonely, dependent on systems and others, quietly determined. Personality: sensitive, observant, emotionally restrained but deeply feeling. Movement vocabulary: slow, controlled, economical. Minimal gestures carry big emotional weight (eye movement, hands, breath). Movement is initially awkward, then becomes quietly confident. She is NOT a warrior—she is an endurer.

characters.name: Him (Volcanic World)

physicalCore.build: athletic, lean-muscular, built for speed and precision rather than bulk
physicalCore.skinTone: medium warm tone, weathered by heat and exertion, with visible perspiration in later acts
additionalFeatures: Visible fatigue accumulates across acts: heavier breathing, slower recovery
Hands show controlled tension—fists when fighting, open when reaching
Body carries the weight of repeated combat in posture

faceSignature.structure: strong angular jaw, pronounced brow ridge, sharp features carved by intensity
faceSignature.eyes: dark intense eyes with focused, scanning quality, narrowed in concentration
faceSignature.hair: short-cropped dark hair, practical, close to the head, slightly disheveled by combat
distinctiveFeatures: Set jaw conveying determination and controlled aggression
Brow furrow that deepens with effort but relaxes in final act
Micro-expressions of pain suppression visible in close-ups

default.description: Futuristic functional clothing allowing freedom of movement. Layered textiles with light armor elements and tactical straps. The outfit connects visually to the fire/volcanic environment but remains human and grounded. Shows progressive wear and damage across acts.
default.signature: Chest-crossing tactical strap system with faint ember-glow threading that mirrors the volcanic cracks in the environment

variations.description: Same outfit with progressive damage: torn fabric, scorch marks, loosened straps. Used in Acts III and IV to show accumulated toll of combat.
colorPalette: exposed volcanic red where fabric is torn

characters.notes: Symbol of effort, force, and trying to overpower an unstable reality. Emotional state: afraid of being too late or not strong enough, anxious, driven, carrying responsibility. Personality: disciplined, intense, protective, focused. Movement vocabulary: martial arts-based with precise, clean technique and controlled aggression. Fast, directional, tailored to environmental obstacles. Visible fatigue later: heavier breathing, slower rises, but refusal to stay down. His arc shifts from trying to DOMINATE the world to NAVIGATING it with intention.
